<!-- Load default options, libraries and write currently used packages to bib -->
```{r include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library("knitr", "rmarkdown", "bookdown")
options(knitr.graphics.auto_pdf = TRUE)
knitr::write_bib(c(.packages()), "bibliography/packages.bib")
```

<!-- Load global data -->
```{r targetos, include = FALSE, cache = TRUE}
librarian::shelf(tidyverse, magrittr)
data_path <- "../TargetOS-Osteosarcoma/03_results/TARGET-OS_GDC_protein_data.tsv"
global_data <- read_tsv(data_path) %>%
  column_to_rownames("hgnc_symbol") %>%
  t() %>%
  as.data.frame()


global_data_scaled <- global_data %>%
  rownames_to_column(var = "sample") %>%
  dplyr::select(-sample) %>%
  scale(center = TRUE, scale = TRUE) %>%
  cbind.data.frame(., row.names(global_data)) %>%
  rename(sample = last_col()) %>%
  column_to_rownames("sample")
global_data_scaled %<>% .[, colSums(is.na(.)) < nrow(.)]
```
